title: Is it from sunnah to pray Sunnah before Fajr quickly, How to pray it in a quick way? - Assimalhakeem
transcript: under which says please tell me how to pray Sunnah of fire quickest as I heard it is soon that repression before Fajr prayer quickly as possible by just simply giving takbir instead of saying al-hamdu lillahi rabbil alameen your do something in her sure-fire sunnah you should recite quickly a Malayala Manorama nahi manikyam edenia cannibal administering and instead of saying subhanAllah be anathema be Hamdi three times say it once and subhanAllah be alarmed three times say it once and so on
